de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.gui.components

Class FieldComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.gui.helper.JClickableComponent
            • de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.gui.components.FieldComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class FieldComponent
extends JClickableComponent
    A JClickableComponent subclass that shows a given Field
    Author:
    Created by Moritz Bruder on 20.09.2017.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  FieldComponent.DrawOffsets
      Simple class holding the offsets required to draw the field into a square view

      Exception used to indicate that a pixel-position is outside the displayed field

      • openPopup

        protected void openPopup(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Description copied from class: JClickableComponent
        To be overridden. If mousePressed and mouseReleased are not overridden (or you call super in your subclass), this will be called when it is appropriate to show a context-menu
        Overrides:
        openPopup in class JClickableComponent
        Parameters:
        e - The MouseEvent that triggered the call

      • getCellCoords

        private Cell.Position getCellCoords(java.awt.Point pixelCoords,
                                    FieldComponent.DrawOffsets drawOffsets)
                             throws FieldComponent.IndexOutsideFieldException
        Claculates which cell-coords occupy the point of the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        pixelCoords - The Target, for which the cell should be found
        drawOffsets - The draw offsets that apply to the current config
        Returns:
        The field.coordinates of the cell that contains the Point with the given coords
        Throws:
        FieldComponent.IndexOutsideFieldException - thrown when the requested pixelCoords are outside the actual grid, but in the border of the component

      • makeRectForCell

        private java.awt.Rectangle makeRectForCell(Cell c,
                                           FieldComponent.DrawOffsets drawOffsets)
        Helper Method that calculates the Pixel outlines for a given cell
        Parameters:
        c - The Cell that should be displayed
        drawOffsets - The draw offsets that apply to the current config
        Returns:
        The Position and Size of a rectangle that may represent the given cell
